help.name: Help
help.description: This command which shows the command list. Enable `detailed` to get the detailed list.

viewprofile.name: ViewProfile
viewprofile.description: View the profile of a Chess.com user. Specify a `format` for detailed stats.

profile.name: Profile
profile.description: View the profile of a user. Leave `user` blank to view your own profile. Specify a `format` for detailed stats.

viewprogress.name: ViewProgression
viewprogress.description: View the progression graph of a Chess.com user. Specify a time `format` to switch format. Specify a `period` of time to expand/shrink the view.

progressgraph.name: ProgressionGraph
progressgraph.description: View the progression graph of a user. Leave `user` blank to view your own graph in a specific time `format`. Specify a `period` of time to expand/shrink the view.

connect.name: Connect
connect.description: Connect your Chess.com account with your account's username.

verify.name: Verify
verify.description: Get a help on how to verify. / Verify your Chess.com account. / Get a new verification code.

flairlist.name: Flairlist
flairlist.description: Get the list of flairs available.

setflair.name: Setflair
setflair.description: Display a flair on profile. Leave `flair_id` blank to remove your flair.

puzzle.name: RandomPuzzle
puzzle.description: Get a random daily puzzle from Chess.com.

analyse.name: Analysis
analyse.description: Analyse a position with the given FEN. Specify a `depth` for Stockfish. Specify a number of `lines` for engine lines.

deepanalyse.name: DeepAnalysis
deepanalyse.description: Deep analyse a position with the given FEN. (Warning: Takes a lot longer than usual analysis (6 minutes on depth 40 test), do not use this unless position is super complicated.) Specify a `depth` for Stockfish.

game.name: StartGame
game.description: Start a chess game with Stockfish or another user. Leave `black_player` blank to play against Stockfish or specify a user the `black_player`.
